Class AirlineMileageManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class AirlineMileageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This program serves as the controller in the MVC design pattern I am using. (Modified, but derived from Project 1)
    Author:
    Walker Booth (wgbooth)

      java.lang.String getMileageReport()

    • Method Detail

      • getMileageReport

        public java.lang.String getMileageReport()
        Produces the mileage report for all cardholders as a String, sorted alphabetically by cardholder last name.
        Returns:
        the mileage report for all customers

      • getMiles

        public java.lang.String getMiles(java.lang.String firstName,
                                 java.lang.String lastName)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Retrieves the frequent flier mileage for the specified cardholder with the given first name and last name. Miles are listed in descending order by distance
        Parameters:
        firstName - - the cardholder's first name
        lastName - - the cardholder's last name
        Returns:
        the frequent flier mileage information for the cardholder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
